name: Day Dreams - A Harold Story
description:
Created for the "Enter the Haroldverse" Game Jam.

Harold daydreams about being a Hero instead of a Farmer.  Follow his origins as he dreams about being something more and takes his chance to make those dreams come true.

Linear Story; On-Map story based encounters; Turn Based ATB Battle System

Created in RPG Maker MZ;  Additional graphics from RPG Maker MV; Plugins from VisuStella, Galv, Gabriel Nascimento, and Aloe Guvner; Music from Joel Steudler, Aedan Sherry, and Murray Atkinson

Yes, it uses RTP Graphics - I tried to embrace them.  Isn't that what Harold is all about?
